nodes.text: The Mneffe-class Superluminal was a rapid passenger shuttle produced by DuroTech during the early years of the Galactic Empire.
The Mneffe-class Superluminal was comprised of a long, central fuselage slung beneath a semi-circular wing.

Capable of carrying up to six passengers and twenty metric tons of cargo, the Mneffe-class required a pilot and copilot to operate, though could be flown with a skeleton crew of one. For defense, the vessel was armed with a turret-mounted double laser cannon.
The Mneffe-class was built by DuroTech.
Corellian Translines bought up almost the entire production run for their transportation services.
